entry.title: [FR][VoIP] - SIP configuration update notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 8, 19:00 UTC  -  Oct 10, 20:00 UTC

Oct 2, 13:29 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VoIP offer.


Start time : 08/10/2024 19:00 UTC
End time : 10/10/2024 20:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we are carrying out maintenance on our carrier SIP.
An individual communication will be sent.


Here is an example of the configuration before and after this maintenance.
Inbound calls routed with the porta prefix 10021 will keep the prefix.
Non ported number and calls routed without prefix will stay as before.


Before :
INVITE sip:+33123456789@IP;user=phone SIP/2.0
To: <tel:+33123456789>


After :
INVITE sip:+3310021123456789@IP;user=phone SIP/2.0
To: <tel:+3310021123456789 >


Thank you for your understanding.

entry.content:
Oct 1, 18:02 UTC

Oct 1, 16:00 UTC

Oct 1, 10:58 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/10/2024 16:00 UTC
End time : 01/10/2024 18:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Our partner will be performing a routine maintenance to optimize performance service on Accounts. This maintenance is expected to impact performance for Accounts services, including the Console, User Accounting, Provisioning and Billing, although, services will remain available at all times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan Reception incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 25, 21:03 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 01/09/2024 17:00 UTC
End time : 25/09/2024 20:53 UTC
Root cause : This incident was due to software issue.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Sep 25, 13:17 UTC
Identified - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams identified the root cause and are currently implementing a fix to resolve the incident.
4% of the accounts that had been affected are no longer impacted.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Sep 25, 09:38 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our collaborative solutions offer.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 01/09/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : With Zimbra migration, storage of emails is migrated too and usage calculation can be differente after migration. It may generate increase of usage of mailbox.
Since Monday 23/09/24, if source mailbox was not over quota, we increase quota of mailbox over 5Go to don't generate impact for you after migration.
Ongoing actions : For customer migrated before, fix is currently in progress to increase quota.
If you want to check your quota, we advice to make it on webmail to see your real quota applied.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
